title: Fail to log in to Service Portal with server error
content:
When you attempt to log in to Service Portal, the following error occurs:
Server Error. Please try to refresh, or come back in a few minutes.

Cause

This issues happens when the itom-xruntime-gateway service is restarted at the backend. When the service is recreated, it's assigned a new IP address by Kubernetes. However, Nginx in itom-xruntime-ui doesn't pick up the new IP address of itom-xruntime-gateway and still attempts to connect to the old IP address.

Solution

To work around this issue, restart the itom-xruntime-ui deployment/service.
